response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the tray. The next step is to grasp the tray. However, the tray is currently under the stove, so the robot may not be able to grasp it. We need to move the robot to the stove first, then grasp the tray.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the stove.
(2) Move the robot to the stove.
(3) Grasp the tray.
(4) Move the robot to the stove.
(5) Put the tray on the stove.
(6) Put the bacon on the tray.
(7) Cook the bacon.
